author: rdonkin
msg: Fixed pretty printing bug i introduced during refactoring

author: rdonkin
msg: Changed project.xml so that the repository setting is specified by a variable. This means that the old setting is available (through an entry in project.properties) but i can override this in my build.properties.

author: rdonkin
msg: Changed writers to use new Sax inspired API. This is a big change with lots of deprecated methods but the new code is less complex and should be easier to work on.
